rule.name: dynamic_ProgressBarField
rule.definition: = load( local!progressBarField_label: "label", local!progressBarField_instructions: "instructions", local!progressBarField_percentage: 50, with( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayoutColumns"( label: "Dynamic Sail Component", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Label", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Label value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!progressBarField_label, saveInto: local!progressBarField_label ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Instructions", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Instructions value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!progressBarField_instructions, saveInto: local!progressBarField_instructions ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Percentage", instructions: "Enter number of dynamic Percentage value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!progressBarField_percentage, saveInto: local!progressBarField_percentage ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_progressBarField"( label: local!progressBarField_label, instructions: local!progressBarField_instructions, percentage: todecimal(local!progressBarField_percentage) ) } ) } ) ) )
